title: The Penguin Guide To Plain English
description:
Harry Blamires, The Penguin Guide To Plain English
ASIN: B0036LIL7Y | edition 2000 | PDF | 369 pages | 10 mb

Harry Blamires, a graduate of University College, Oxford, was formerly Dean of Arts and Sciences at King AlfredÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s College, Winchester. He was Visiting Professor of English Literature at Wheaton College, Illinois, in 1987. The University of Southampton has awarded him a D.Litt. in recognition of his achievements as a writer. His total output of some thirty books includes fiction and theology, but he is widely known for his works of literary history and criticism.
